data.text:
@poppy_northcutt Nice. 
Hope you are perfectly well.
@poppy_northcutt Poppy you’re the greatest.  I suspect this has always been the case!
@alisoncook @poppy_northcutt Dropped in to say the same thing, so I'll just say DITTO.
@MyDogIsFunny I was in a “back room”. There were several rooms that weren’t on the public feed for tv.
@MyDogIsFunny My city reported 7 new deaths from it today. I view those as tip of iceberg. What isn’t visible yet is the long term sequella from all those infections.

@poppy_northcutt Your banner pic is so moving! As a child in the 60s my family always watched launches. My brother was going to be an astronaut (alas poor eyesight), but it never occurred to me I could sit among all those men in white shirts & ties. Sorry to say I never glimpsed you!

@poppy_northcutt Sad but not surprised.  I am very worried about all the restrictions being lifted, they always seem to do it too soon. Sure I'd love to go party like it's 2019, but there are much bigger issues at stake.
@poppy_northcutt That’s some classic Poppy, right there. Love you!! 💕
